snippet: A man who ran away from a chicken-plucking assignment was given a summons for taking refuge in a park at night. But the summons, undated, had no teeth.
abstract: A man who ran away from a chicken-plucking assignment was given a summons for taking refuge in a park at night. But the summons, undated, had no teeth.

headline.main: Escaping a Dead Chicken, and an Invalid  Summons
